sect2.title: Installation of ProFTPD
sect2.para: For security reasons, running ProFTPD as an unprivileged user and group is encouraged.

userinput.command: groupadd proftpd && useradd -c proftpd -d /home/ftp -g proftpd -s /bin/false proftpd
